name: Dandy II Chair
description: Inspired by the original Dandy Bench by KIFU PARIS, the Dandy II Chair is the ultimate luxury seating for a dining room or corner area. The seating area is inlaid in cream shagreen and the legs, frame and sides of the chair are inlaid in bronze-patina brass. The backrest is upholstered with white vachette. Other versions are also available as part of the Dandy II Capsule. Currently made to order 8-10 weeks. Design SKU reference KCHR02. Shagreen, Vachette, Palm Wood, and Bronze-Patina Brass. All Kifu Paris pieces are handmade by artisans, ultimately making each piece unique. Custom color/sizing available on request. Wipe clean with soft dry cloth.
